description:
The kernel-rt packages provide the Real Time Linux Kernel, which enables fine-tuning for systems with extremely high determinism requirements.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: In Overlayfs missing a check for a negative dentry before calling vfs_rename() (CVE-2021-20321)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Bug Fix(es):

* kernel-rt: update RT source tree to the Rocky Linux-8.5.z1 source tree (BZ#2023988)

* [rt] Rocky Linux-8.6: disable KASAN, KCSAN and UBSAN for kernel-rt (BZ#2026384)
name: RLSA-2021:5241
synopsis: Moderate: kernel-rt security and bug fix update
topic:
An update is available for kernel-rt.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
